skills.name: Choose appropriate standard units to estimate and measure volume in different situations
Estimate the volume or capacity of an object
Given an object and the numerical value of its volume, select the units it is most likely to have been measured in
Estimate the weight of an object
Given an object and the numerical value of its weight, select the units it is most likely to have been measured in
